title: OPINIONS AND ATTITUDES
description: In this first part of the survey, we are interested in your attitudes about a number of social and economic issues. Following are a series of statements. Please indicate how much you agree with the statements, the number from the scale below which comes closest to describing how you feel. For example, writing in a '6' next to a statement indicates you strongly agree with that statement. You may write in any number from 1 to 6. There are no right or wrong answers so just tell us your opinions.
instructions: PLEASE ENTER ONLY ONE NUMBER FOR EACH ITEM.
statements: Becoming a success is a matter of hard work. Luck has little or nothing to do with it.
An ambitious person can almost always achieve his or her goals.
I take measures to make sure my health will be good when I get old.
In general you are more acceptable to people if you don't smoke.
It's the duty of each person to take part in community activities.
There's nothing wrong with showing you've made it.
I have regular physical checkups with a doctor.
I enjoy having a definite routine to the things I do.
I am very careful about how I dress.
I feel a need for new experiences.
What my friends think has a great deal of influence on the things I do.
A lot of people seem to object to others smoking around them.
I feel a need to continue to improve my mind.
